title: Antenna Boss
description: This schema is sent by the DISCOS AntennaBoss component. It holds valueable info regarding the antenna pointing, the currently pointed target, as well as some other additional information.

FWHM.title: Full Width at Half Maximum
FWHM.description: Full width at half maximum of the antenna beam.

azimuthOffset.title: Azimuth Offset
azimuthOffset.description: Offset applied to the azimuth angle.

correctionEnabled.title: Pointing Corrections
correctionEnabled.description: Indicates whether automatic pointing correction is enabled.

declinationOffset.title: Declination Offset
declinationOffset.description: Offset applied to the declination angle.

elevationOffset.title: Elevation Offset
elevationOffset.description: Offset applied to the elevation angle.

generatorType.title: Generator Type
generatorType.description: Type of pointing generator used for tracking.

latitudeOffset.title: Galactic Latitude Offset
latitudeOffset.description: Offset applied to the galactic latitude.

longitudeOffset.title: Galactic Longitude Offset
longitudeOffset.description: Offset applied to the galactic longitude.

observedAzimuth.title: Observed Azimuth
observedAzimuth.description: Observed azimuth angle of the antenna.

observedDeclination.title: Observed Declination
observedDeclination.description: Observed declination angle of the antenna.

observedElevation.title: Observed Elevation
observedElevation.description: Observed elevation angle of the antenna.

observedGalLatitude.title: Observed Galactic Latitude
observedGalLatitude.description: Observed galactic latitude of the antenna pointing.

observedGalLongitude.title: Observed Galactic Longitude
observedGalLongitude.description: Observed galactic longitude of the antenna pointing.

observedRightAscension.title: Observed Right Ascension
observedRightAscension.description: Observed right ascension of the antenna pointing.

rawAzimuth.title: Raw Azimuth
rawAzimuth.description: Raw azimuth reading from the encoder.

rawElevation.title: Raw Elevation
rawElevation.description: Raw elevation reading from the encoder.

refractionCorrection.title: Refraction Pointing Correction
refractionCorrection.description: Atmospheric refraction correction applied to elevation.

site.title: Site
site.description: Geodetic and timing metadata for the antenna site.

longitude.title: Site Longitude
longitude.description: Longitude of the site, in degrees east of Greenwich.

latitude.title: Site Latitude
latitude.description: Latitude of the site, in degrees north of the equator.

height.title: Site Height
height.description: Geodetic height of the site above the reference ellipsoid.

xPosition.title: ECEF X Position
xPosition.description: X coordinate in the Earth-Centered Earth-Fixed (ECEF) reference frame. X=0 lies in the plane of the Greenwich meridian.

yPosition.title: ECEF Y Position
yPosition.description: Y coordinate in the ECEF frame. Y=0 lies in the plane of the meridian 90Â° east of Greenwich.

zPosition.title: ECEF Z Position
zPosition.description: Z coordinate in the ECEF frame. Z=0 lies in the plane of the equator.

xPolarMotion.title: X Polar Motion
xPolarMotion.description: X component of the Earth's polar motion (xp), in arcseconds.

yPolarMotion.title: Y Polar Motion
yPolarMotion.description: Y component of the Earth's polar motion (yp), in arcseconds.

DUT1.title: DUT1
DUT1.description: Difference between UT1 and UTC (DUT1 = UT1 - UTC).

ellipsoid.title: Ellipsoid Model
ellipsoid.description: Geodetic reference ellipsoid used for position and height calculations.

target.title: Target ID
target.description: Identifier or name of the current observed target.

targetDeclination.title: Target Declination
targetDeclination.description: Declination coordinate of the observed target.

targetRightAscension.title: Target Right Ascension
targetRightAscension.description: Right ascension coordinate of the observed target.

tracking.title: Tracking Flag
tracking.description: Indicates whether the antenna is tracking the given coordinates.

vradDefinition.title: Target Radial Velocity Definition
vradDefinition.description: Radial velocity definition of the target.

vradReferenceFrame.title: Target Radial Velocity Reference Frame
vradReferenceFrame.description: Reference frame used for the target radial velocity measurements.
